11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abdullah that:The Prophet (ﷺ) said: "It is not right for any one of you to say: 'I have forgotten such and such a verse.' Rather, he has been caused to forget. Study the Qur'an, for it escapes from the heart of man faster than a camel escapes from its fetter

chapter.ara-name: باب جَامِعِ مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقُرْآنِ
chapter.eng-name: Collection of what was narrated concerning the Quran
